Covid-19 pandemic has thrust the world into a state of crisis, stress, and loss of lives. Due to the constant rise in these numbers, there has been a massive realization about the importance of building immunity to prevent viral diseases. While medical and laboratory experts are working at a permanent treatment for the virus, many healthcare professionals are urging the nation to adopt Ayurveda. Immunity in Ayurveda is called the Bala or Vyadhi Kshamatva which is derived from a combination of two words meaning disease and resistance. It is an in-built resistance power of an individual that fights various illnesses and keeps the body healthy. This power is different in each individual and can change due to alterations in diet, lifestyle, and various health conditions.With the support extended to AYUSH Ministry by the honourable Prime Minister of India, several initiatives have been taken to utilize the vast potential of Ayurveda in this pandemic. This is causing a surge in demand for Ayurvedic medicines especially for boosting immunity.
